content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Multiple electricity poles forming electricity group id=8550

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 1
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 2
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) containing iron gear wheels
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5) containing automation science packs
- Connected belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Issues with Extracting Items
- Ensure the target chest contains the required items before attempting extraction
- Verify the chest position coordinates are correct when attempting to extract items

### Power System Issues
- Keep boilers fueled with coal to maintain consistent power generation
- Monitor fuel levels in boilers to prevent power outages

### Production Line Issues
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor assembling machine input inventory to maintain continuous production
- Keep proper supply of both copper plates and iron gear wheels for automation science pack production

### Resource Management
- Maintain adequate coal supply for all burner-type entities
- Keep input materials stocked in appropriate chests to prevent production stoppages
